channel.title: Need help with codes
channel.description:
can anyone please tell me or show the how to make commands working for PI 317 such as ::home because i tried myself to make one. i copy the last code i used in a random 317. i also need someone to help me or show me make the code for switching magic from ancient to normal magic. i would like the code to be like ::ancient for ancient magic and ::modern for normal magic. can anyone help me with my coding please?
thanks i would apreciate it alot.

thanks alot, this really helps. i will test this out later, thanks though

item.title: Need help with codes
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

you will have to do something like this:

if command (changebook ) && sidebarinterface = 0 {
setsidebarinterface 1
else if siderbarinterface = 1 {
setsidebarinteface 0
}
}

its not needed to use 2 commands though, just let it check the spellbook type

and to make tele commands

if commandequals(home) {
triggertele(X, Y); //x and y are the coordinates, also can be that your servers uses hight then it has to be
triggertlee(x, y, height);
to change the position without the teleport effect u can use
toX =
toY =
